CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
CurrentVersion.description: A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
OldVersion.description: A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -  Viva Pulse  templates to measure Copilot readiness, adoption & impact as part of Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now use new templates specific to M365 Copilot Readiness, Adoption & Impact to measure employee sentiment around their organization's Copilot adoption. These templates will be available as part of your Microsoft365 Copilot subscription as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -  Viva Pulse  templates to measure Copilot readiness, adoption & impact as part of Microsoft 365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now use new templates specific to M365 Copilot Readiness, Adoption & Impact to measure employee sentiment around their organization's Copilot adoption. These templates will be available as part of your Microsoft365 Copilot subscription as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
CurrentVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
OldVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for dwell time and clicks graphs in Amplify reporting
CurrentVersion.description: This release will add two new graphs to Amplify reporting: dwell time and clicks. The dwell time graph will indicate the average time users spend reading a publication, giving important insight into the engagement of users with the Amplify campaign. The clicks graph will indicate the number of times a link in the publication was clicked by a reader, again giving important insight into the engagement level of users. Both of these metrics will be supported from SharePoint and Outlook channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
OldVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Updates to the Microsoft 365 app
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 app name, icon, and UI will evolve to support future AI-first experiences. Key UI changes include reducing the top header and consolidating app-level tools and settings into the App toolbar on the left.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document name matches patterns, document size equals or is greater than, document Property Is, and document name contains words or phrases.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move email between mailbox and PST file in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able move (drag and drop) emails from a .pst file to a mailbox and vice versa. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Manage email in PST files in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to move, copy, delete, flag/unflag, mark as read/unread, and set categories for email within .pst files. Additionally, users will be able to create, delete, move, and rename folders within .pst files. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Category management for delegates
CurrentVersion.description: This allows mailbox owners to grant category management to delegates when sharing a calendar. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Category management for delegates
OldVersion.description: This allows mailbox owners to grant category management to delegates when sharing a calendar. #newoutlookforwindows
